snippet.title: Version 1.3 Teaser - "Virtual Revenge" | Zenless Zone Zero
snippet.description:
You are the heroes of New Eridu_
You make for the best combat data_
And I, the one who controls the system, am like a god here. I can do whatever I want_
...
"Leave it to me, Miyabi.
—Let's start the combat test."

Welcome to the VR System. You will never leave_

—Welcome to New Eridu!—
PS5™/iOS/Android/PC | Version 1.2 "Tour de Inferno" of Zenless Zone Zero, HoYoverse's urban fantasy ARPG, is out now: https://hoyo.link/6SOkFDAL

▼ Official Community ▼
Follow our official social media for more info on Zenless Zone Zero:
